name: 明日、初めて彼女と❤
description:
❤Story❤
A cute and kind girlfriend I met on SNS.
I'm finally going on a date with her tomorrow and really looking forward to it!
But the next day, Who do you think appeared at the meeting place...?

At 4 date spots, Experience a slightly real and laughable date with her!


❤Feature❤
・You can date your UNIQUE girlfriend with this game system.
・Because it is a casual volume, you can play quickly.
・You can play FIRST DATE with the same girl as many times as you want.
・Of course it's a multi-ending game!
